scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache config/matic.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/mainnet.json src/network.template.ts > src/network.ts
scripts.prepare:mumbai: mustache config/mumbai.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/mumbai.json src/network.template.ts > src/network.ts
scripts.prepare:local: mustache config/local.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/local.json src/network.template.ts > src/network.ts
scripts.dev: yarn prepare:local && yarn codegen && yarn deploy-local -- --version-label v0.0.1
